name: Hà Giang - Đồng Văn - Mèo Vạc
description: There is a set of mock banners available <u>here</u> in three colours and in a range of standard banner sizes

name: Sapa - Lào Cai
description: Explore the stunning terraced rice fields and vibrant hill-tribe cultures of Sapa and Lào Cai.

name: Hội An - Đà Nẵng
description: Wander through the ancient streets of Hội An and enjoy the beautiful beaches of Đà Nẵng.

name: Phú Quốc Island
description: Relax on the pristine beaches and explore the lush jungles of Phú Quốc Island.

name: Nha Trang
description: Dive into the crystal-clear waters and enjoy the vibrant nightlife of Nha Trang.

name: Đà Lạt
description: Experience the cool climate, stunning waterfalls, and French colonial architecture of Đà Lạt.

name: Huế - Huế Imperial City
description: Explore the rich history and majestic architecture of Huế, including the Huế Imperial City.

name: Cần Thơ - Mekong Delta
description: Discover the vibrant floating markets and lush landscapes of Cần Thơ and the Mekong Delta.

name: Hạ Long Bay
description: Cruise through the breathtaking limestone islands and emerald waters of Hạ Long Bay.

name: Phong Nha - Kẻ Bàng National Park
description: Explore the stunning caves and pristine jungles of Phong Nha - Kẻ Bàng National Park.
